# -- coding: utf-8 -- “”” Created on Tue Nov 29 14:57:14 2022

@author: atakan “””

Properties needed for integration at given values of pressure and specific enthalpy, single phase.

param h:

specific enthalpy in J/kg.

type h:

float

param p:

pressure in Pa.

type p:

float

param fluid:

type fluid:

an AbstractState in coolprop. or fluid name in Refprop

param option:

if 0 also transport properties will be calculated (not yet implemented for REFPROP) with option 1 : T,p,h,v,s,x is calculated

type option:

integer

param units:

units in Refprop (imposrtant: must be SI and mass based (kg, Pa etc.))

type units:

integer

returns:

alle – if option = 0 it includes: T, p , quality, specific enthalpy,entropy densities, viscosities, cp , conductivity,phase prandtl-number at the defined state (p,h) all in SI units.

if option =1: it is compatible to the high level output T,p,h,v,s,x.

rtype:

numpy array

Properties needed for integration at given s and p, single phase.

param s:

specific entropy in J/kg.

type s:

float

param p:

pressure in Pa.

type p:

float

param fluid:

type fluid:

an AbstractState in coolprop. or fluid name in Refprop

param option:

if 0 also transport properties will be calculated (not yet implemented for REFPROP) with option 1 : T,p,h,v,s,x is calculated

type option:

integer

param units:

units in Refprop (imposrtant: must be SI and mass based (kg, Pa etc.))

type units:

integer

returns:

alle – if option = 0 it includes: T, p , quality, specific enthalpy,entropy densities, viscosities, cp , conductivity,phase prandtl-number at the defined state (p,h) all in SI units.

if option =1: it is compatible to the high level output T,p,h,v,s,x.

rtype:

numpy array

Properties needed for integration at given temperature and pressure, single phase. option 0 (many properties) not yet implemented for REFPROP!

param temp:

temperature in K.

type temp:

float

param p:

pressure in Pa.

type p:

float

param fluid:

type fluid:

an AbstractState in coolprop.

returns:

alle – if option = 0 it includes: T, p , quality, specific enthalpy,entropy densities, viscosities, cp , conductivity,phase prandtl-number at the defined state (p,h) all in SI units.

if option =1: it is compatible to the high level output T,p,h,v,s,x.

rtype:

numpy array
